name: Who am I? (Robert Ursache)
description:
This project is an Horror Escape-Room type project. 
I made this project because of what happened to my  grand father a couple of years ago. He walked out of the house and got hit by a car which resulted him being in a hospital for a couple of weeks. Thorough these weeks he was diagnosed with dementia. He tried to escape the house because he though someone was trying to harm him, so this game has a personal connection to me and I would really appreciate if you could give any feedback on what I can improve on and on what I good. 

Thanks!

NEW UPDATED IS OUT! 
Bugs Updated:

Added some new walls which means that now the player has to go thorough all the puzzles in order to complete the game!

Solved the last door bug. Now the open rate is 100% and not random. :)

Changed the narrator voices a little to make it more realistic.

Changed the plotting of the puzzles a bit because some people found it hard to pass some puzzles.

NEXT UPDATE: 1ST of February 2020
